item.title: How do i create ma own server? plzzz help me!
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“Mod Nate, post:3, topic:94377”][quote author=hell boi link=topic=136678.msg1316401#msg1316401 date=1179114736]
how do i create one. step by step guide plz.
[/quote]

Sweet mother of fuck… I hate people who post this kinda shit its freaking spam… ANd im going to shoot everyone who types “please” “plz” its freaking annoying as hell…[/quote]dude cool your jets he is new to the forms give him a break u did to when u first come i pertty sure u did

[quote=“InternalorExternalCommand, post:5, topic:94377”]Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Then download Hamachi to get onto servers(Unless they are no-ip servers)

Hamachi here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

Go download a source from the Downloads section of mopar.

This is how to use hamachi.

For creating a network you should be the one running the server.

Click “Create Network”

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
TestScape

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test[/quote]wow man u aways right there when people need ya good job

Read full topic

item.title: How do i create ma own server? plzzz help me!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Then download Hamachi to get onto servers(Unless they are no-ip servers)

Hamachi here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

Go download a source from the Downloads section of mopar.

This is how to use hamachi.

For creating a network you should be the one running the server.

Click “Create Network”

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
TestScape

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test
